sentences: Kas sa kuulsid tema esinemist? See oli täiesti braavo!
context: The word 'braavo' is an interjection used to express praise, admiration, or approval. It's borrowed from Italian and commonly used in Estonian to applaud someone's performance, achievement, or action when they have done something exceptionally well. It can be used as a standalone exclamation or within sentences to convey strong positive feedback.
